sections.title: Character Creation
sections.description: Creating a character is now much more documented. This includes guidelines for the Experience Market, rolling Potential Scores, and purchasing Archetype levels.

sections.title: Roleplay and Gameplay
sections.description: A player's General Action cards have been built, giving all players baseline capabilities during initiative scenes. Flavor Tokens have also been added to the ruleset, giving players a rewsrd system for good roleplay. Flaws are now a type of Experience Goal. Resting benefits are now defined.

sections.title: Resolution Rehaul
sections.description: The Hybrid Roll-Under and Volatility system has been respecced to promote simplicity and narrative streamlining.
